sentences.sContent: Farmers say they need less rainwater if they use fertilizer trees.
sentences.sContent_eng: Farmers say they need less rainwater if they use fertilizer trees.
sentences.sCn: 农民们说，如果它们使用肥料树，就只需要很少的雨水。

sentences.sContent: Water pollution into streams will be reduced because large volumes of rainwater will be harvested for reuse instead of entering the water pollution cycle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Water pollution into streams will be reduced because large volumes of rainwater will be harvested for reuse instead of entering the water pollution cycle.
sentences.sCn: 社区将通过这一创新的项目获益，减少污水进入小河，大量的雨水被收集重新使用,不使水循环污染 .

trans.tranOther: water that has fallen as rain
